General.Name: Ningbo Joyson Electronic Corp
General.Description: Ningbo Joyson Electronic Corp. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of automotive components in China and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Automotive Electronics and Automotive Safety. It offers cockpit/automotive connectivity systems, intelligent driving, and new energy management products, as well as software and related services; and seat belts, safety airbags, intelligent steering wheels, and integrated safety solutions. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
